message: The FDA is closely monitoring the emerging shortage situation. We encourage manufacturers to report any disruptions and collaborate to ensure supply stability.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with insufficient supply and disrupted market stability. message: The FDA is aware of an emerging shortage in the market and is actively monitoring the situation. We encourage manufacturers to report any disruptions and coordinate to address supply issues. Patient safety remains our priority.

message: The FDA is issuing a shortage alert for the affected drug due to emerging supply disruptions. We encourage manufacturers to increase production capacity where possible and urge stakeholders to coordinate effectively to mitigate impact. Healthcare providers should monitor inventory levels and prioritize critical needs.
decision_context: {'shortage_assessment': 'The shortage is emerging with insufficient supply and disrupted market stability.
